'''Fish''' were common throughout the bodies of water in [[Arda]].

Fish formed the chief source of food in [[Númenor]], as it was abundant throughout the coast of the island. The fisherfolk dwelt mainly in [[Nindamos]], built on the hards of a marshy land. [[Guild of Venturers
column2: Mariners]] of Númenor were mostly drawn from the fisher folk.<ref name="Descr">{{UT

column1: When the [[Númenóreans]] travelled to [[Middle-earth]], they encountered the [[Pre-Númenóreans
column2: primitive tribes]] there. Though some of them, along the mouths of [[Morthond]] and [[Gwathló]], had crude fisheries, they had fallen out of use as its people fled towards the mountains.<ref>{{UT
column4: Elmar}}</ref> The [[Stoors]] that dwelt in the [[Vales of Anduin]] also had fish as their main food. Two of them, [[Déagol]] and [[Sméagol]], were fishing when they found [[the One Ring]], lost in the river [[Anduin]].<ref name="Shadow">{{FR

column1: The [[Gondorians]], much like their forefathers, ate fish. The [[Ethir Anduin
column2: Ethir]] was populated by fisher-folk, who often went out to [[Belegaer
column4: MT}}</ref> because fishing was the most profitable business.<ref>{{PM
